'''Drifting Luminescence''' is a [[Character Event Wish]] with the 5 Star [[Character]] "Pearl of Wisdom" [[Sangonomiya Kokomi]] ({{Hydro}}) as the promoted character with an increased chance to be obtained.

{{Wish History Table}}

==Trivia==
